contents.title: M.S. in Mechanical Engineering
contents.institution: University of Colorado Boulder, Boulder, CO

contents.title: B.S. in Computational and Applied Math
PhD Student
contents.institution: University of Colorado Boulder - Autonomous Robotics and Perception Group
contents.description: Researching autonomous robotic systems for revegetation of degraded rangelands.

contents.title: PhD Student
contents.institution: University of Colorado Boulder - Animal Inspired Movement and Robotics Laboratory
description: Experimented on wolf spiders to analyze locomotion under various gravitational loads.
Analyzed spider video data using DeepLabCut, advised by Kaushik Jayaram.

contents.title: PhD Student
contents.institution: University of Colorado Boulder - Soft Matter Mechanics Group
description: Studied dynamic networks in active matter, modeling swarm behaviors in fire-ant aggregations.

contents.title: Summer Research Assistant
description: Prototyped modular subunits for a boundary-constrained soft robotic system for 2D manipulation.
Collaborated with Matthew Spenko (IIT) and Heinrich Jaeger (U. Chicago) under the NSF C3 SoRo grant.

contents.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
description: Enhanced sensor interfaces for the Electronic Nose project to allow modular gas sensor use.
Project aimed at AI-based odor fingerprinting for industrial and medical applications.

contents.title: Towards an Autonomous Robotics Platform for Degraded Rangeland Restoration
contents.publisher: Proceedings of the 18th International Symposium on Experimental Robotics (ISER 2023)

contents.title: Towards Decentralized Heterogeneous Multi-Robot SLAM and Target Tracking
contents.publisher: ICRA 2023 Workshop on Distributed Graph Algorithms

contents.title: Treadmilling and dynamic protrusions in fire ant rafts
Language-Guided Seeding Interface
description: Developed algorithms for language-based seeding and navigation.
Conducted experiments using a custom Unreal Engine simulation interfacing with ROS.

contents.title: RestoreBot
description: Designed a platform for degraded grassland navigation and optimal microsite identification.
Applied Mask RCNN for field environment vegetation and microsite detection.

contents.title: Collaborative Target Tracking
description: Implemented a distributed system for decentralized collaboration among heterogeneous robots.
Enabled efficient multi-robot SLAM and target tracking in dynamic environments.

contents.title: Vex Robotics Head Referee
description: Refereed VEX Robotics Tournaments for Elementary and Middle School students.

contents.title: ARPG Robotics Summer Camp
description: Led annual lab tours for elementary and middle school students from St. Vrain Valley School District.
